The likely disasters here are, in decreasing order of likelihood

1) a once-in-a-century blizzard. Very manageable, especially with neighborhood church meetinghouses.
2) An earthquake. Mostly okay, our buildings are small. 
3) A quake that destroys dams up the canyon. OH NO.

A hurricane, then, you might get a head start. 

A tsunami, though. Ooof. 

And of course an earthquake or tornado, those are the worst.
